original_text: Now the man Moses was very meek, more than all people who were on the face of the earth.
korean_text: 이 사람 모세는 온유함이 지면의 모든 사람보다 더하더라

sentences.original_text: Now the man Moses was very meek
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그 사람 모세는 매우 온순했습니다

sentences.original_text: who were on the face of the earth
